segment.source: Distribute apps using your private store (Windows 10)
segment.target: Distribute apps using your private store (Windows 10)

segment.source: The private store is a feature in Windows Store for Business that organizations receive during the sign up process.
segment.target: The private store is a feature in Windows Store for Business that organizations receive during the sign up process.

segment.source: Distribute apps using your private store
segment.target: Distribute apps using your private store

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 10 Mobile
segment.target: Windows 10 Mobile

segment.source: The private store is a feature in Windows Store for Business that organizations receive during the sign up process.
segment.target: The private store is a feature in Windows Store for Business that organizations receive during the sign up process.

segment.source: When admins add apps to the private store, all employees in the organization can view and download the apps.
segment.target: When admins add apps to the private store, all employees in the organization can view and download the apps.

segment.source: Your private store is available as a tab in the Windows Store, and is usually named for your company or organization.
segment.target: Your private store is available as a tab in the Windows Store, and is usually named for your company or organization.

segment.source: Only apps with online licenses can be added to the private store.
segment.target: Only apps with online licenses can be added to the private store.

segment.source: You can make an app available in your private store when you acquire the app, or you can do it later from your inventory.
segment.target: You can make an app available in your private store when you acquire the app, or you can do it later from your inventory.

segment.source: Once the app is in your private store, employees can claim and install the app.
segment.target: Once the app is in your private store, employees can claim and install the app.

segment.source: To acquire an app and make it available in your private store
segment.target: To acquire an app and make it available in your private store

segment.source: Sign in to the Store for Business.
segment.target: Sign in to the Store for Business.

segment.source: Click an app and then click Get the app to acquire the app for your organization.
segment.target: Click an app and then click Get the app to acquire the app for your organization.

segment.source: You'll have a few options for distributing the app -- choose Add to your private store where all people in your organization can find and install it.
segment.target: You'll have a few options for distributing the app -- choose Add to your private store where all people in your organization can find and install it.

segment.source: It will take approximately twelve hours before the app is available in the private store.
segment.target: It will take approximately twelve hours before the app is available in the private store.

segment.source: To make an app in inventory available in your private store
segment.target: To make an app in inventory available in your private store

segment.source: Sign in to the Store for Business.
segment.target: Sign in to the Store for Business.

segment.source: Click Manage, and then choose Inventory.
segment.target: Click Manage, and then choose Inventory.

segment.source: Click Refine, and then choose Online.
segment.target: Click Refine, and then choose Online.

segment.source: Store for Business will update the list of apps on the Inventory page.
segment.target: Store for Business will update the list of apps on the Inventory page.

segment.source: From an app in Inventory, click the ellipses under Action, and then choose Add to private store.
segment.target: From an app in Inventory, click the ellipses under Action, and then choose Add to private store.

segment.source: The value under Private store for the app will change to pending.
segment.target: The value under Private store for the app will change to pending.

segment.source: It will take approximately twelve hours before the app is available in the private store.
segment.target: It will take approximately twelve hours before the app is available in the private store.

segment.source: Employees can claim apps that admins added to the private store by doing the following.
segment.target: Employees can claim apps that admins added to the private store by doing the following.

segment.source: To claim an app from the private store
segment.target: To claim an app from the private store

segment.source: Sign in to your computer with your Azure Active Directory (AD) credentials, and start the Windows Store app.
segment.target: Sign in to your computer with your Azure Active Directory (AD) credentials, and start the Windows Store app.

segment.source: Click the private store tab.
segment.target: Click the private store tab.

segment.source: Click the app you want to install, and then click Install.
segment.target: Click the app you want to install, and then click Install.

segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: Manage access to private store
